M

main(String[]) - Static method in class configure.InitTool
Main for various command lines related to application initialization.


java -cp semlinker.jar configure.InitTool -redisinit
- Initialize the Redis Base (remove all the content)

java -cp semlinker.jar configure.InitTool -metadataload filename_and_path
- Load NLGbAse metadata in the Redis base from the metadata file (see www.nlgbase.org)

Perform various analysis on results according to a reference.

main(String[]) - Static method in class semkit.demos.LODRetrievalSample
Main Sample : get a LOD resource related to a city, and obtain related information

Command line:
java -cp semlinker.jar semkit.demos.LODRetrievalSample

Options:
-cityname name_of_a_city

Example:
java -cp semkit.jar semkit.demos.LODRetrievalSample -cityname Lille
main(String[]) - Static method in class semkit.demos.RedisNLGbAseSample
This main entry point verifies if the Redis base manager is active and loaded with current NLGbAse metadata.
main(String[]) - Static method in class semkit.demos.SemanticExtractorSample
Main method, you can give a String in parameter and this sample returns complementary information on the submitted sentence.


Command line:
java -cp semlinker.jar semkit.demos.SemanticExtractorSample

-h help
-apikey key / define your own API key
-text filename / annotate a text file given in command line

MutualDisambiguation - Class in nlp.upperlevel
This class receives an WikimetaXMLDecoder Annotated Object, retrieves all the DBPedia or Wikipedia content for each link, and uses them to disambiguate.
